    VITE_API_TARGET=https://gateway:3000
    VITE_WS_TARGET=wss://gateway:3000

    VITE_BALL_SPEED_FACTOR=1.07
    VITE_BALL_MAX_SPEED=0.7
    VITE_PADDLE_HEIGHT=0.3
    VITE_PADDLE_SPEED=0.7
